definitions: hang from a hook, hanger, etc.

examples.text: his good shirt's ironed and hanging up
the room had a closet where he could hang up his clothes

definitions: cease or retire from the activity associated with the garment or object specified

examples.text: he will soon have to hang up his referee's whistle for good

shortDefinitions: cease or retire from activity associated with garment or object specified

definitions: end a phone conversation by cutting the connection
shortDefinitions: end telephone conversation by cutting connection

definitions: end a phone conversation with someone by abruptly and unexpectedly cutting the connection

examples.text: somebody called up and the reporter hung up on him

shortDefinitions: end telephone conversation with someone abruptly
